title: New Discord party started
description: New party with topic "Make Me a Sandwich" has been started on Discord. Click this notification to go over there.

title: JPEGs are now supported
description: In addition to WEBP and PNG, you can now choose to store your images as JPEGs, which can significantly save on space at the cost of some quality.

title: HordeNG got notifications
description: HordeNG now supports notifications and this is just to let you know that you can go over to settings and disable them.
